mapper.select: select sum(case str_month when 01 then sum end) jan22, sum(case str_month when 02 then sum end) feb22, sum(case str_month when 03 then sum end) mar22, sum(case str_month when 04 then sum end) apr22, sum(case str_month when 05 then sum end) may22, sum(case str_month when 06 then sum end) jun22, sum(case str_month when 07 then sum end) jul22, sum(case str_month when 08 then sum end) aug22, sum(case str_month when 09 then sum end) sep22, sum(case str_month when 10 then sum end) oct22, sum(case str_month when 11 then sum end) nov22, sum(case str_month when 12 then sum end) dec22 from ( select count(*) as sum, substr(b_joindate, 6,2) as str_month, substr(b_joindate, 1,4) as str_year FROM Buyer where substr(b_joindate, 1,4) =2022 group by substr(b_joindate,6,2) ) buyer
